trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSMJISTOCKYARDMANAGEMENT_00786_OFFICER_000_000<tab>Where shall I send an expedition to next?

TEXT_CTSMJISTOCKYARDMANAGEMENT_00786_OFFICER_000_005<tab>We've just had a team return from an expedition! I have everything they gathered here, so be sure to collect the materials when you have a moment.

TEXT_CTSMJISTOCKYARDMANAGEMENT_00786_OFFICER_100_000<tab>At the granary, you can dispatch a team of the finest mammet explorers to collect various materials from an area of your choosing. You just tell me where you want them to go, and I'll have them out there in a jiffy.

TEXT_CTSMJISTOCKYARDMANAGEMENT_00786_OFFICER_200_000<tab>A fellow explorer, I see. You're welcome to tour the island─erm, assuming you have the owner's permission─but I'm afraid the comings and goings of this facility are strictly confidential.
TEXT_CTSMJISTOCKYARDMANAGEMENT_00786_OFFICER_300_000<tab>That new cavern has been the talk of the isle! If you'd like, I can send a team down there to see what lucrative materials we can find.
